scene_rules: Skin should have subtle texture variations and pores
Hair strands should show natural irregularity
Eyes should have slight asymmetry
Lighting should have natural falloff with soft shadows
Background blur should follow optical physics (bokeh)
Skin tone should vary across different facial regions
Sky gradients should be subtle and natural
Foliage should have random leaf distribution
Water reflections should have slight distortion
Distant objects should have atmospheric haze
Shadows should follow consistent light direction
Textures should degrade with distance
Multiple light sources create complex shadows
Surfaces should show wear and use patterns
Reflections should account for multiple surfaces
Wood grain and fabric textures should be irregular
Perspective lines should converge naturally
Color temperature varies by light source
Surface reflections should match environment
Materials should have appropriate specularity
Edges should have subtle imperfections
Shadows should be soft with proper penumbra
Labels and text should follow surface curvature
Background should have subtle gradient or texture
avoid_patterns: Pure white or gradient backgrounds without context

scene_rules: Pavement should show wear and staining
Buildings should have weathering patterns
People and vehicles should have motion context
Signage should show age and environmental effects
Lighting should reflect time of day accurately
Reflections on wet surfaces should be complex
Lighting should have natural falloff
Textures should have micro-variations
Edges should not be uniformly sharp
Colors should have subtle variations
Shadows should be consistent with light sources
Reflections should match the environment
avoid_patterns: Perfect geometric shapes in natural objects
Missing shadows or incorrect shadow direction
